div.div: ἱστο-πέδη : mast-stay, mast-block, a thwart or transverse beam with a depression into which the mast fitted, which was by this means, as well as by the ἐπίτονοι, prevented from falling forward, Od. 12.51. (See cut, letter b.)
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
